name: Reddup

topics.topic_text: That seems like a real risk, considering there are so few safety rails.
topics.response_text: Oh, you're definitely looking at a lot of risk, up here.

topics.topic_text: If you don't like it, I hear there's an opening for work Downtown.
topics.response_text: I already fought my way outta there once. There ain't no force in The Pitt that could make me go back there again.{Boasting}
Ah, talk to this! Get her, boys!

topics.topic_text: I'm going to find you and kill you.
Remember your little ambush at the gate? Let's settle the score.
topics.response_text: What, you didn't like our little welcome? Us big kids playing too rough with you?{Mocking}

topics.topic_text: Nah, I'm just messing with you.
topics.response_text: Yeah, that's right! Keep walking, little shit.{Disgusted that the player backed down}

topics.topic_text: Time for a rematch, just you and me.
topics.response_text: That's it! This is between me and the little shit! Nobody else!{Yelling for everyone to hear}
What? You thought you could kill my buddies at the gate and we'd just let you walk in here?

description:
Reddup is a 35 year-old African American Male.

A formidable Pitt raider with a scarred face and a menacing presence. Reddup is a former slave who fought his way to freedom and power in the brutal arena of The Pitt. His muscular frame and calloused hands speak of a life of constant struggle and violence. He now commands respect among the raiders and is known for his ruthless efficiency in capturing and controlling slaves.

Reddup's Personality: Ambitious, ruthless, and pragmatic. Reddup is driven by a deep-seated desire to maintain his hard-earned position in the hierarchy of The Pitt. He is suspicious of newcomers and quick to assert dominance through intimidation. Despite his evil nature, he is disciplined and follows Ashur's orders when it suits his interests. He harbors a particular disdain for those who have never known the suffering of slavery.

Reddup's Backstory: Born in the wastelands surrounding Pittsburgh, Reddup was captured by slavers as a young man and brought to The Pitt. For years, he endured the brutal conditions of slavery, forced to work in the steel mills and serve the raiders. However, Reddup refused to be broken. He bided his time, honing his combat skills in secret until he saw his opportunity in the arena. With a combination of raw strength, cunning, and sheer determination, he fought his way through the gladiatorial challenges, eventually earning his freedom. He is now one of only three individuals known to have achieved this feat, alongside the notorious Gruber and Squill. Having tasted freedom, Reddup chose to remain in The Pitt, using his skills to rise through the raider ranks and become a key enforcer of Ashur's regime.
